Description:
Reading and interpreting technical specifications and blueprints 
Reviewing the work area to determine the number of materials required 
Providing clients with an estimate of the work completion timelines 
Measuring and cutting steel bars correctly 
Bending and laying out steel bars, rods, and mesh as per the specifications 
Joining steel bars using fitting spacers and by welding 
Fixing steel bars and mesh by applying cement 
Preparing and pouring cement and other concrete mixes into prepared casts 
Using hand and power tools to perform daily activities 
Setting up and positioning steel bars, plates, and other steel units 
Clearing the work area before and after work Skills
